name: Reconstruction
description:
Reconstruction is a cyberpunk taste scrolling 3D DANMAKU shooting game in an aerially contaminated world only human beings exist.
Get closer to the enemies, lock-on and destroy all of them with the missiles.

MISSION

In 2098, on April 13th, top military brass made a mistake and the nuclear bomb was exploded.
Controller chip for AI added latest weapons had damaged. AI recognized human-being as enemy and started charging forward.
Our troop got on a special battle plane called "ARMS" connecting to cranial nerve prepared to engage the enemy.
We’re ready to attack the enemy on the earth.

FEATURES

▪ You need to clear 5 stages with no miss to start 2nd round


▪ There are 2 types of challenging level "NORMAL" and "ARCADE"

▪ You can choose stage by using "STAGE SELECT"

▪ You earn extra bonus point when you shoot closer to your enemy.

▪4 fighters will be unlocked when you collect the battle data.

▪You can play with a game pad and keyboard.

▪ On-line ranking available
